thread.title: Lehigh Valley trick-or-treat times, Halloween parades and events 2015
thread.title_full: Lehigh Valley trick-or-treat times, Halloween parades and events 2015 - The Morning Call

author: mcall.com
title: Lehigh Valley trick-or-treat times, Halloween parades and events 2015
text:
When is trick or treat in the Lehigh Valley? Here is a complete list of trick or treat times and Halloween parades for towns around the Lehigh Valley area for 2015.
Click here to see a list of haunted houses and other Halloween attractions and events .
Alburtis: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
Allentown: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30. No rain date.
Bangor: 3-5 p.m. Oct. 25.
Bath: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30.
Bethlehem: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30. Rain date, Oct. 31.
Bethlehem Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31..
Catasauqua: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30. Rain date, Oct. 31.
Lehigh Valley Ghost Guide 2015: Haunted houses and other Halloween attractions Debra Schnecker Halloween is well under way in the Lehigh Valley, with fun and games for the both the daring and the timid. The favorites are back for 2015 and two regional attractions — Bates Motel and Terror Behind the Walls — are celebrating 25 years of frightful fun.
There are new attractions at Dorney's Halloween...
Halloween is well under way in the Lehigh Valley, with fun and games for the both the daring and the timid. The favorites are back for 2015 and two regional attractions — Bates Motel and Terror Behind the Walls — are celebrating 25 years of frightful fun.
There are new attractions at Dorney's Halloween...
(Debra Schnecker) Coopersburg: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30. No rain date.
Coplay: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30. Rain date, Oct. 31.
East Allen Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30.
East Penn Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 28.
Easton: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
Emmaus: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 29.
Forks Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
Freemansburg: 6-9 p.m. Oct. 30.
Hamburg: 6-8:30 p.m. Oct. 29-29.
Hanover Township, Northampton County : 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30.
Heidelberg Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 29.
Hellertown: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
Jim Thorpe: Noon-5 p.m., Oct. 31-Nov. 1.
Kutztown: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 28.
Lehigh Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 29.
Lehighton: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 28.
Lower Macungie Township: 6-9 p.m. Oct. 31.
Lower Milford Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30.
Lower Mount Bethel: 4-6 p.m. Oct. 31.
Lower Nazareth: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
Lower Saucon Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
Macungie: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
New Tripoli: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
North Catasauqua: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30.
Northampton: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
North Whitehall Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30. No rain date.
Palmer Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
Palmerton: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 28.
Pen Argyl: 3-5 p.m. Oct. 25.
Perkasie: 6-9 p.m. Oct. 31.
Phillipsburg : 5-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
Pottsville: 4-6 p.m. Oct. 29 in downtown Pottsville, Safe Trick or Treat.
Quakertown: 6-9 p.m. Oct. 31.
Salisbury Township : 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30.
Sellersville: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
South Whitehall: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30. Rain date, 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
Upper Macungie Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30.
Upper Mount Bethel Township : 4-6 p.m. Oct. 31.
Upper Saucon Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 30. Rain date, Oct. 31.
Williams Township: 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31.
Weisenberg Township, Lehigh County : 6-8 p.m. Oct. 31. No rain date.
TRICK-OR-TREAT AT THE MALL
Lehigh Valley Mall: 11 a.m.-noon Oct. 24
Palmer Park Mall: 3 p.m. Oct. 25
South Mall: 3 p.m. Oct. 24
The Outlets at Sands: 11 a.m.-noon Oct. 31.
HALLOWEEN PARADES
Allentown: 2 p.m. Oct. 18. Begins at the Allentown Fairgrounds and proceeds on 17th Street to Hamilton Boulevard, down Hamilton to Ninth Street. Rain date, Oct. 25.
Bangor: 7 p.m. Oct. 15. Begins at Bee Hive, Pennsylvania Avenue and ends at Bangor Elks Lodge, Broadway.
Bath: 7 p.m. Oct. 20. Begins on Broad Street and ends in Firemen's Park. Rain date, Oct. 21.
Bethlehem: 2 p.m. Oct. 25. Parade forms at 15th Avenue and Broad Street, continues down Broad to Main Street, south on Main to Lehigh and Spring streets. Rain date, Nov. 1.
Boyertown: 7 p.m. Oct. 24. Begins at Second and Madison streets and proceeds west on Philadelphia Avenue, south on Reading Avenue, east on Third, south on Monroe and east on Second Street.
Catasauqua-North Catasauqua : 7 p.m. Oct. 21. Race Street, Second Street, Bridge Street, Third Street, Arch Street to North Catasauqua Park. Rain date, Oct. 28.
Coopersburg: 3 p.m. Oct. 11. Begins at Linden Gardens on Locust Valley Road ends on Fairmont Street. Rain date, Oct. 18.
Coplay: 7 p.m. Oct. 20. Begins at North Ninth and Chestnut streets and ends at Coplay Saengerbund. Rain date, Oct. 27.
Easton-Phillipsburg : 3 p.m. Oct. 25. Begins at South Main Street, Phillipsburg, and ends at Centre Square, Easton.
Emmaus: 7 p.m. Oct. 17. Begins and ends at Keystone and Ridge streets. Rain date, Oct. 18.
Hamburg: King Frost Parade, 7 p.m. Oct. 31. Begins at Third Street and Port Clinton Avenue, and ends at Fourth Street and Port Clinton. Rain date, Nov. 7.
Harleysville: 11 a.m. Oct. 24. Begins at Indian Valley Middle School, down Maple Avenue, left onto School Lane, left onto Kulp Road, left onto Park Avenue and ends at the Harleysville Community Center.
Hellertown-Saucon Valley: 2 p.m. Oct. 18. Saucon Valley Spirit Parade forms at the Saucon Valley School District campus, Walnut Street and Polk Valley Road, proceeds west on Walnut, north on Main, east on Water, south on Rentzheimer, east on Durham, south on Constitution and back to schools. Rain or shine.
Jim Thorpe: 4 p.m. Oct. 26. Begins at high school, down Center Street to Ninth and to North, ends at Second and Center streets.
Lehighton: 4 p.m. Oct. 17. Begins at Eighth and Coal streets and ends at the Recreation Center, Eighth and Iron streets. Rain date, 2 p.m. Oct. 18.
Macungie : 7 p.m. Oct. 24. Begins at Buttonwood and Main streets, west on Main, south on Race, east on West Chestnut, north on South Church, east on Main to Macungie Park. Rain date, Oct. 31.
Nazareth: 1 p.m. Oct. 17. Begins at Schafer Elementary School on Liberty Street, travels West on Belvidere Street to Main, North on Main to the circle, East on Center Street, ends at high school. Rain or shine.
Northampton: Jack Frost Parade, 7 p.m. Oct. 22. Begins at Smith Wayne and Laubach Avenue and ends at borough hall on Lerchenmiller Drive. Rain date, Oct. 29.
Northern Lehigh: 6:30 p.m. Oct. 31. Main Street, Slatington. Rain date, Nov. 1.
Palmerton: 4 p.m. Oct. 18. Begins and ends at Seventh Street.
Quakertown: 2 p.m. Oct. 18. Begins at Seventh and Juniper streets, west to 11th, to Broad, down Broad to Third, to Juniper Street. Rain date, Oct. 25.
Riegelsville: 2 p.m. Oct. 18. Begins at St. Lawrence's Catholic Church, and ends at Riegelsville Fire Department. Rain date, Oct. 25.
Sellersville: 10 a.m. Oct. 31. Begins at Sellersville Museum, 120 E. Church St. and ends at Sellersville Fire House, Main Street. Bad weather location, Fire Hall, Two N. Main St.
Slatington-Walnutport: Northern Lehigh parade at 6:30 p.m. Oct. 31. Rain date, Nov. 1.
Tamaqua: 7 p.m. Oct. 27. Broad Street.
Topton: 7 p.m. Oct. 10, Rain date, Oct. 11.
Upper Perkiomen: 7 p.m. Oct. 25. On Main Street (Route 29) through the boroughs of Red Hill, Pennsburg and East Greenville. Rain date, Oct. 27.
Vera Cruz: Begins and ends at Mystic Chain Park. Rain date, Oct. 15.
Whitehall Township: 2 p.m. Oct. 11. Begins at Church Street and First Avenue in West Catasauqua, travels south on First to Third Street, to Jefferson Street, ends at the Fullerton Memorial Playground. Rain date, 7 p.m. Oct. 15.
